DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of VX-765 in subjects with chronic plaque psoriasis treated for 28 days.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Clinical Study in Psoriasis With Oral Investigational Drug VX-765
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with chronic plaque psoriasis for at least 6 months Prior systemic therapy Current or prior history of illness precluding use of immunomodulatory therapy.
